comments.html: it seems my guy made a mistake in this statement " One idea could be to use BFD echo mode in the data plane with a short detection interval and a control plane session with a long detection interval" bfd is either done on software and RP who take care of sending both control and echo packets or its offloaded to hardware. just my two cents but i think bfd is only necessary when it doesn't share fate with control plane
